o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Entity_DefaultMappingSelector
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Comment:
This extended attribute is an alternative to the 'Mapping' attribute of a mapping which stores the default mapping of the entity. The reason we override this attribute is so we can implement our own custom Edit method to support the workflow of a modeller.
This is a calculated attribute which stores the selection in the DefaultMapping attribute of the entity.
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript: Function %Get%(obj) ' Return the current DefaultMapping of the Entity (if it's set). If Not(obj.DefaultMapping Is Nothing) Then Set %Get% = obj.DefaultMapping End If End Function
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:SetMethodScript: Sub %Set%(obj, value) ' If a mapping is select in the drop-down, store it in the DefaultMapping of the Entity. Set obj.DefaultMapping = value End Sub
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Label: Default mapping
